recipesJson.name: Samoa Sammies | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart. If you've never tried a Samoa cookie, you are missing out!  These delicious delights are made of,  shortbread cookies with caramel, chocolate, and coconut.  But we took it to the next level and added Ice Cream!  Full recipe notes on DEVELOPED Episode 48 at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7cMDYbOwvc .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

reviews.text: This is awesome..had to wait almost a month to get Bounty but was worth every day..
Dangggg, this is incredibly accurate. If you were looking to mix a samoa, this is literally it, except with ice cream. Eat one and vape it, it'll keep you up at night...great job as always guys!

Excellent ADV! After a 7 day steep, this is one of the best recipes I've tried. a very accurate shortbread cookie with texture. I really don't get a seperate layer of a chocolate drizzle or coating, the chocolate feels more incorporated into the cookie layer, making this more like a chocolate shortbread cookie . The ice cream layer is a fantastic ice cream made with vanilla coconut milk and swirls of toffee, very thick 'n creamy. This could easily be added to the Legacy line of one shots. On my 2nd 60ml  and realizing I should've made a 120ml.
